highlights: Launched the Summer Safety update with a refreshed home page that spotlights the most-used crash, trail, and eco dashboards in one place.
Introduced neighborhood-level crash density heatmaps so planners can spot hotspots without running custom queries.
Added a quick-start guide link in the header to help new agency partners get oriented in minutes.
Rolled out corridor comparison cards that highlight year-over-year crash trends for your saved routes.
Made the downloads page friendlier with plain-language file names and estimated download sizes.
Improved screen reader support across the portal navigation for better accessibility.
Published a new overview tab that explains what each dashboard covers and who it helps.
Simplified sign-in messaging so first-time users know exactly which credentials to use.
Tuned the mobile layout so charts resize cleanly on tablets during field visits.
